name: Resonant Automata
description:
Somewhere, in the dark corners of a magician youkai's home, an autonomous doll is cleaning.
Cleaning is its given mission... but it is glad to be there. It is looking for a lost, broken friend.
Maybe, if their creator saw that this doll needed to be repaired, they would be together again.

A very, very short platformer made for Touhou Pride Jam 3 in 24 hours. Maybe I should have started two weeks ago. Who cares, download free today and go save your confusingly named pal Hourai.
